name: Rotatex 3
description:
Rotatex 3 is a continuation of the fascinating story of the Rotatex cat. In the game you have to smoothly rotate the level and solve puzzles.
  • Features of the game:
  • Smooth rotation of the level
  • Doors and switches
  • Atmospheric music
  • Progress
  • The original story

The player's task is to direct the Rotatex Cat to the teleport exit, and for this you have to solve puzzles related to physics and level rotation.
